column4: ok I have just tried to install flash from a tar.gz file what do i do now: taruser@user-laptop:~$ tar -xvzf /media/PENDRIVE/flashplayer_10_1r82_76_linux.taz.g
there is a ppa at sevenmachine for flash 64 as well as flash in the archives. i would suggest using one of those
not entirely certain. make sure flash is uninstalled you dont want any confusion. and then add the flashplugin to your ~/.mozilla/plugins folder?
